channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: TikTok Shop launches digital gift cards to challenge Amazon and eBay

item.title: The Doomsday Glacier Is Getting Closer and Closer to Irreversible Collapse
item.description: An analysis of the expansion of cracks in the Thwaites Glacier over the past 20 years suggests that a total collapse could be only a matter of time.

item.title: Grado Signature S750 Review: Insane Sound, Old-School Fit
item.description: These open-back headphones sound insane, but they aren't that comfortable.

item.title: Waymo resumes service in San Francisco after robotaxis stall during blackout
item.description: Waymo suspended its SF robotaxi service on Saturday evening after a massive blackout appeared to leave many of its vehicles stalled on city streets.

item.title: Tech Disrupted Friendship. It’s Time to Bring It Back

item.title: The Best Japanese Planners (2026): Hobonichi Techo, Kokuyo Jibun Techo
item.description: Are Japanese planners like the Hobonichi really better than American planners? Here’s where they differ and why you might want to switch.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which we’ve been updating throughout the year.

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2025.

item.title: A rough week for hardware companies
item.description: iRobot, Luminar, and Rad Power Bikes were very different companies, but they faced some similar challenges.
